what are the limitations of running windows os's in virtual box?  Are somethings not working yet?
seems like a better option that dual booting, is it?

for casual use it's very good. But there are some things you can't do from an emulator, i.e. access special hardware. It's also a tad slower. But there's nothing like it if you want to run multiple different distros
what kind of special hardware are you talking about?
well, anything that's a pci card, for example...
is it possible they will support that in the future?
probably not. There's a lot of hardware out there. How to choose what to support?
is there some hardware you have that you need to support?
